name: Simple Shooter Metasounds audio demo
description:
"You have been sent to a rebel base occupied by cyborgs. Kill them all in order to claim the base for the alliance...".

This game is part of the final project of Udemy's C++ Unreal Certification, created in collaboration with Epic Games, where I included extra features like:

  • custom emote sfxs when enemies detect you
  • the use of metasounds for playing both music and sfxs.

This game audio demo uses the following Unreal features

  • Dynamic mixing with audio ducking using Sound Classes
  • MetaSound interactive horizontal resequencing synced to beat.
    • Notice what happens when you deal/receive damage ...
  • MetaSound footstep/shoots/impacts using using random pitch/volume/asset

How To Play

  • Use "arrows" or keys "AWSD" keys to control your character.
  • Click on Left mouse button to Shoot.
  • Press "SpaceBar" to jump.
  • Press "Escape" to show game options.

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda.
Music and sound effects made by www.soundxp.net.

Assets:

  • Paragon: Wraith by Epic Games
  • Modular SciFi S1 Starter Pack by Jonathon Frederick
